_header: As we may by Saint Martin see / That was so full of charity
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle ; St Martin and the Naked Pilgrim
_description: St Martin and the Naked Pilgrim, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Als we maie be saynte martin seþat was so full of
                    charite…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat we in heuene him finde mayeAmen i rede þat we
                    all saye
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
AS we may bi seint Martin seÞat was so ful of
                    Charite…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat we in heuene hym fynde MayAnd wiþ hym lyue
                    euere in play. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 275.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Als we may by Seynt Martyn seÞat was so full of
                    charite…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat we in heuene fynde it mayAnd þore in blisse to
                    lif for ay

CULDd11.First Lines:
As we may be seynt martyn seÞat was so ful of
                    Charite…
CULDd11.Last Lines: …And þat it may so beSey we amen pur Charite

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Als we may be sainte martyn seThat was swa full of
                    charite…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…That we in heuen hym fynde mayAmen amen I rede we
                    say

BLHar2391.First Lines: Als we may be saynt martyn seþat was so full of charite…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …þat we in heuen fynd mayAmen I red we all say
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: In die pasche (left margin, f. 185v), with “A tale” written below

MinULZ822.First Lines:
als we may be saynt martyn seþat was ful fulle of
                    charyte…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þat we in heuen fynde hym may& þer to lyfe with
                    & hys hallus ayand thurght his grace þat yt saveAmen now all
                    hale say we

HunHM129.First Lines:
As we may be seint martyn seþat wos so ful of gode
                    charyte…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þat we in heuyn hym fynd mayAnd þare with hym ay
                    lyue in play
